page.title: 16ENTERTAINMENT-Clubs-Dollies
page.content: I belong to a club that visits old peoples homes and the over 60s.We have a stage on which we sing and dance. There are twenty children in the club nineteen girls and one boy called Ian.Most of the songs we sing are old ones like 'Its a long way to Tipperary' and 'Tulips from Amsterdam'.At the beginning of the shows we come on one by one and sing 'Nik Nac'.I am number three to come on.The costumes we wear consist of a T shirt with{Dolly mixtures}written on it and a blue and white checked skirt with a frill around it.The little children wear pink and white checked skirts and a pink ribbon in their hair .We have practices every Wednesday in the cricket hut on the green.Another girl and I do a song by ourselves called 'twenty tiny fingers'.
